resources.string: Click the refresh button to immediately load another restaurant suggestion.
Click the address to immediately start heading over to the restaurant.
Click the phone number to give the restaurant a call.
Eating with friends? Use the share button to tell them all about the restaurant.
Your default location is currently set to \"Automatic"\, which means that you need to enable location services to allow Food Button to get your current location. Would you like to do that now?
